title._content: [Portrait of Machito, Jose Mangual, Carlos Vidal(?), and Graciella Grillo, Glen Island Casino, New York, N.Y., ca. July 1947] (LOC)

description._content: Gottlieb, William P., 1917-, photographer. [Portrait of Machito, Jose Mangual, Carlos Vidal(?), and Graciella Grillo, Glen Island Casino, New York, N.Y., ca. July 1947] 1 negative : b&w ; 2 1/4 x 2 1/4 in. Notes: Gottlieb Collection Assignment No. 222 Reference print available in Music Division, Library of Congress. Purchase William P. Gottlieb Forms part of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Machito Mangual, Jose Bolado, Vidal Grillo, Graciella Jazz musicians--1940-1950. Latin jazz--1940-1950. Big bands--1940-1950. Women jazz musicians--1940-1950. Percussionists--1940-1950. Glen Island Casino Format: Portrait photographs--1940-1950. Group portraits--1940-1950. Film negatives--1940-1950. Rights Info: Mr. Gottlieb has dedicated these works to the public domain, but rights of privacy and publicity may apply. lcweb2.loc.gov/diglib/ihas/html/gottlieb/gottlieb-copyrig...
